WHERE title LIKE '%${search}%'
GROUP BY A.aid ORDER BY A.aid DESC
LIMIT #{offset}, 20

SELECT pw FROM article WHERE aid = #{aid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (title, body, pw) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{pw})
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, body = #{body} WHERE aid = #{aid}
